DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the efficacy in two dose regimens of ofatumumab in combination with CHOP (cyclophosphamide,doxorubicin, vincristine,prednisolone) in previously untreated patients with Follicular Lymphoma (FL)
DOC.brief_title: Ofatumumab (Humax-CD20) With CHOP (Cyclophosphamide,Doxorubicin, Vincristine, Predisolone) in Follicular Lymphoma (FL) Patients
DOC.criteria: Patient with Follicular Lymphoma (FL) Confirmed diagnosis of Follicular lymphoma 18 years or above Verbal and written information about the study No previous treatment for Follicular Lymphoma Clinical suspicion that the Follicular Lymphoma has transformed to aggressive lymphoma Several diseases such as malignancies etc. Screening laboratory values Current participation in any other interventional clinical study Breast feeding women or pregnant women Women of childbearing potential not willing to use adequate contraception
